lines: #GO ON A DATE/HAVE AN EXPERIENCE WITH YOUR PRESENT PARTNER
I'm sorry, but presently you don't have a relationship.
There are none of these experiences you can do right now.

According to your past relationship behavior, you are involved in a serious relationship. Choosing to continue from here means that you are willing to cheat, risk losing your partner and suffer the emotional consequences of the breakup.
Where would you like to meet this person?
#SOME PLACE OTHER THAN SCHOOL OR WORK
*comment @SLS|You have seen him studying in the school library.|You have noticed him working out in the Physical Education Building.|He works at the courtesy counter in the school bookstore.|
*set dss "You have seen him studying in the school library."
*set dss "You have noticed him working out in the Physical Education Building."
*set dss "He works at the courtesy counter in the school bookstore."
*comment @SLS|He is a trainee in the front office.|He is an accountant who has done your family's taxes.|He is in charge of one of the departments where he works.|
*set dss "He is a trainee in the front office."
*set dss "He is an accountant who has done your family's taxes."
*set dss "He is in charge of one of the departments where he works."

*comment @SLS|He is a stripper at a club in town.|You met him while you were grocery shopping. |He is a famous television actor. While shooting a film on location, he walked right off the set and wanted to get to know you.|
*set dss "He is a stripper at a club in town."
*set dss "You met him while you were grocery shopping. "
*set dss "He is a famous television actor. While shooting a film on location, he walked right off the set and wanted to get to know you."
Whom would you like to meet?
You have chosen to meet with ${loverName}. Your first impression suggests that:
This is how the two of you first run into each other:
The two of you meet and chat for a while; he seems very nice.
Unfortunately, you don't have the social skills necessary to impress him. He doesn't ask you out.
Since you both seem to be attracted to one another, you decide to go out.
Even though he seems to like you, he takes your number but doesn't call.
Your husband finds out you have been "on the prowl" and leaves you.
Your husband doesn't find out about this relationship (for now).
You were caught trying to weasel your way into another relationship.
Your old boyfriend dumps you. Now you have no one!
Both guys dump you. Now you have no one!
Your old boyfriend dumps you. You still have ${loverName}.
You're obviously upset -- and confused! You don't have a boyfriend to break up with.
Even though you have chosen to break off this relationship, it will still have an impact on you personally. Please check the status screen to see what adjustments have been made.
You don't even have a boyfriend!
You and ${loverName} make a handsome couple.
${loverName} doesn't want to get serious right now. Sorry.
Didn't you notice the other toothbrush and the extra laundry? You are already living together!
It would probably be a better idea if you were at least going steady first.
After thinking it over, ${loverName} agrees and you move in together.
Your husband does not fail to notice that you are living with another man. I'm afraid your marriage is over.
${loverName}'s parents don't think it's a good idea and have convinced him to avoid it.
${loverName} feels he really doesn't think he could do this right now. He wants his privacy.
